28887.name: Figma Faker
28887.description:
This project is for generate fake data figma plugin for component recognization, it can modify the nodes with random text/color/coordinate... easily. Feel free to add new fake function.

ğŸ’«Feature

  1. Fake text: Randomly change the text of nodes.
  2. Fake color: Randomly change the color of nodes.
  3. Fake coordinate: Randomly change the coordinate(X/Y) of nodes. It include the collision detection.

ğŸ�’How to Use

With only a few clicks, you can replace any place you want with random text/color!

1. open plugin

2. select nodes that you want to replace with random data

3. click Fake___

4. done!

ğŸŒ»Github Repository

https://github.com/clean99/figma-faker
28887.release_notes:
-support random text
-support random color
-support random position

27617.name: Cercle
27617.description:
Open source your designs on cercle.design, and let others contribute to them.


Note: this project is still in beta, please report any bugs to richardmguerre@gmail.com.

28716.name: WhichUI (Work In Progress)
28716.description:
WhichUI let you vote and post your own creation to know which one is the most appropriate for your project.


You can also find informations about the project and us here: https://which-ui.com

28248.name: Floating
28248.description:
Select any layer and let it float on the canvas.


You don't have to look around for information that needs to be pinned to the top when you're designing with Figma and Figjam.


Tips:

  • Drag the lower right corner of the window to resize the window.
  • Double-click the lower right corner of the window to automatically resize the window to match the content.
  • The floating window is forced to close while other plugins are running, just use the "Previous" command to quickly restore it.
  • The selected layer will be exported as an @2x image and placed in the floating window, you can drag it back into the canvas. Even more useful, you can also drag it into any chat tool or browser.

28071.name: Boiler
28071.description:
A simple Figma plugin that generates a boilerplate file structure.


Another whistle to save your time ğŸ�¶

28899.name: word2word translate
28899.description:
When you need a translation, do you replace everything manually?

The plugin provides a list of word pairs that correspond to a language and can be easily replaced.


  1. Create a language correspondence table.(Must be Exact match to the Text in the design)
  2. Upload the SCV file to the plug-in.
  3. Press "Start" :)


  • We have confirmed that it works with comma-separated UTF-8 csv files. (Best to use Microsoft Excel)
  • Plug-ins are under development and will be considered for improvement as needed.

29153.name: Shader (UI)
29153.description:
Generate shades and tints of any color using an intuitive UI.


Gone are the days for guessing what shades of your base color might look like. Preview all generated shades in real-time.


Create up to 255 shades of your selected base color.


How to Use:

  1. Go to Plugins > Shader (UI) OR Click Ctrl + / (For Windows) or âŒƒ + / (For Mac)
  2. Select the color you want as your base color.
  3. Select 'Lighten' or 'Darken' from the dropdown.
  4. Enter the number of shades you want to generate and click 'Create'.


Suggestions to improve the plugin are much appreciated. Enjoy! ğŸ˜Š

28623.name: Hexpal
28623.description:
Import HEX colors fast.

Colors are automatically added to a frame for easy organising.

28099.name: Quick Setup
28099.description: Quick Setup will create a few pages to get your indie project started.

28024.name: Page markup
28024.description: Mark the page and switch to the page

29279.name: Loom Embed
29279.description:
Loom is the video communication tool for async work. You can express your thoughts in less time, sharing quick feedback, or deep communication with just a click. The Loom Embed plugin allows you to embed public Loom videos in your Figma designs, adding rich video context.


Use embedded Looms in Figma to walk through and explain your designs, drop in additional historical context, and add personality to asynchronous collaboration.


You can add Loom videos to your canvas in seconds. Launch the plugin and paste in your Loom share URL. Hit Add and place the video wherever you need to add more context to your board.


Currently, the plugin only works for public Loom videos! Adding a Loom share URL that is private will prompt the user to open the Loom video in a browser.

28777.name: Brand Guardian
28777.description:
Brand Guardian is an AI driven platform that gives marketing, creative and production teams total content quality assurance at scale. This plugin connects Figma with Brand Guardian platform to enable a review process that will ensure the designs are on brand, inclusive and compliant.


To use this plugin you need a Brand Guardian account. If youâ€™re interested but donâ€™t have one yet, please contact us at obg@wundermanthompson.com.


How does it work? 

  1. Log into your Brand Guardian account. 
  2. Select part of the design you want to review. 
  3. Choose the Brand and Rule Collection for the design. 
  4. Submit the asset and wait for feedback. 


Contact information 

Email: obg@wundermanthompson.com 

Website: https://www.wundermanthompson.com/brand-guardian

29393.name: XAuto
29393.description:
Auto Layout Presets:


  • Horizontal
  • Vertical
  • Stretch Horizontal
  • Stretch Vertical
  • Space Between Horizontal
  • Space Between Vertical
  • Toggle Direction


All presets are available as plugin parameters and individual menu items so you can create shortcuts that suit you.


Padding and Spacing Panel


Assign a shortcut like `Ctrl + Shift + A` to quickly access frame padding and spacing options.


How To Use


  1. Select the items you want to apply a preset to. If the items are not already in a frame, XAuto will create a parent frame for you.
  2. Apply preset via the plugin parameters or menu
  3. Profit
29393.release_notes: â€¢ Fixed bug causing Padding + Spacing panel to break

29406.name: Clapy (closed beta)
29406.description:
â„¹ To access the closed beta, please join our Discord server and head to the channel #get-early-access.


You are using Storybook and would like to share your components between Figma and Storybook? Create and maintain a unified Design System without the hassle by syncing Figma with your code:


  • Import Storybook components into Figma from a Storybook URL, so you can use the latest production-ready elements in your mockups.
  • Generate all variants from code in seconds, with the props you need.
  • Auto-layout is applied to imported components, if they are responsive in the source code.
  • Preview the final component in the plugin when you click on a component, to add context to your mockups.
  • (Soon) generate React code when updates are made to components in your Design System, so developers can focus on complex integrations with fewer repetitive tasks.


30 second demo video


Not using Storybook? Don't hesitate to contact us, we want to support more cases soon.


Find out more at https://clapy.co/
29406.release_notes: Fix variants manager and improve home page explanations.

29078.name: Automatin
29078.description:
Automate your tasks with the Figma JavaScript library.


How to use it?

Just write your code as if you were coding a plugin, and click on "Run code".

You can find the documentation here: https://www.figma.com/plugin-docs/api/figma/.


Why?

Instead of creating a plugin for each small automation, you can now write it directly in Figma. This means that you no longer have to:

  • create a plugin from scratch, which can be redundant
  • download the Figma Desktop app (because to use the plugin online, the moderators have to give their permission)


The project is open-source. Find the code here: https://github.com/arthur-fontaine/automatin-for-figma/.

29167.name: Status Changer
29167.description:
Status Changer allows you to easily change the name of the person in charge and the modified date on your own Component set.


HOW TO USE

  1. Install `Status Changer` and run it inside of a project.
  2. Edit the Component Set created for the Status bar.(Note whether the item has been added to Variants.)
  3. Select the Frames, etc. to which you want to add a status bar and run Status Changer.
  4. You can select your own customized component set values, and the status bar(s) will be added when you select and press the SET button.
  5. After changing the status, click "Change user name and modification time." from the plugin in the properties screen on the right.


About Dates and Dates

Multiple country formats are supported, including American and British, Asian, etc.


Sample For January 2, 2022 at 11:03 p.m.


For the British "DD/MM/YY H.mm a" 02/01/22 11.03 pm

For the U.S. "MM-DD-YY H:mm a" 01-02-22 11:03 pm

For the Japan "YYYY/MM/DD HH:mm" 2022/01/02 23:03

Click Here For More Info! 


Caution

Be sure to place it directly below the page.

Do not rename the properties.

relaunchButtons.name: Change user name and modification time

29352.name: Color DS
29352.description: The Color Design System helps you to transfer all of your color styles from one file to another. This is a MVP for a complete color system that lets you create semantic colors and makes it easy to swap between dark and light mode.

29341.name: Case Converter
29341.description:
Changes the case of text in selected nodes to "Sentence case", "Title Case", "UPPER CASE" or "lower case".


Supports locale conversion, which means, it converts istanbul to Ä°STANBUL, if Turkish selected as language.

parameters.name: Locale
parameters.description: Select language for localised conversion (istanbul -> Ä°stanbul).

parameters.name: Locale
parameters.description: Select language for localised conversion (istanbul -> Ä°stanbul).

parameters.name: Locale
parameters.description: Select language for localised conversion (istanbul -> Ä°stanbul).

parameters.name: Locale
parameters.description: Select language for localised conversion (istanbul -> Ä°stanbul).

29332.name: Flesch-Kincaid Grade Level Calculator
29332.description: Measure readability of your copy with this Flesch-Kincaid grade level calculator. Select a frame, and then open the plug-in.

29262.name: Position
29262.description: Set position and constraints with margin to center or corners.

29333.name: Quick Status
29333.description:
Apply status indicators to your layers in a flash:


  • Work In Progress
  • Ready For Review
  • Requires Changes
  • Approved


All statuses can be set using plugin parameters or the handy Status Panel.


Assign a shortcut like `Ctrl + Option + S` to quickly access the status panel.


How To Use


  1. Select the items you want to apply a status to.
  2. Apply a status via the status panel or via plugin parameters
  3. Profit
